desc: I am a web developer who has a few app ideas that I would like to bring to life but as yet do not have the knowledge to create them. So I am looking for someone to not only help me design the app but also  bring new ideas to the table.I want to build a collaborative storytelling app. Social media is king, and even though we can connect with millions of other people, we rarely put stories together in one place. They usually revolve around one person taking the spotlight. Sooooooo, I have an idea that will allow people to tell a funky little story with people they may yet not know, or do know and just want to have a bit of fun. It will make far more sense when I have a 1 on 1. But collaborative storytelling is the aim.
title: Collaborative Storytelling Mobile App

desc: This an app made for people to help each other one on one. When the individual creates an account they provide us with their email-address, name, birthday (Tutors has to be 18 or older), and payment method. You can create a customer account or/and a tutor account. The customer provides what they need help with and add keywords to narrow the issue addressed. The tutor writes a description of what kind of skill they can offer and a short summary about themselves, as well as adding keywords for what fields they can help in. Once the customer post the issue they are facing, the keywords will match with tutors that can help in that specific area. They now can get in contact with them by several options: Video Call, call, send pictures or through text. it is all laid out in the app (Similar to the snapchat layout).After the work is done the customer has to pay the tutor for its help. The customer has already set a certain amount they are willing to pay for the work that is needed to be done. An automatic payment will be done once the work is finished. A percentage of the payment will be withdrawn from the total that goes to us as developers. The tutor will then be paid a lil bit less after tax, but they will be informed of this at the very beginning. Once the payment is done, the customers wish will be removed from the page as completed.The layout needs to be very simple and easy to navigate. It should be a section where people can rate the page and talk about their experiences. It should also be a contact information to contact us, the developers if any help is needed. The design should be simple, clean, updated, and highly professional.
title: Create an App for iPhone and android

desc: Project DescriptionI need an application that runs on Android phones and can send/receive calls through SIP (Can use any sip stack like sipdroid) and forward it to the GSM network. If android Layers have a problem for this job, you can use replicans OS. The application should then forward the audio and convert from SIP to GSM and vice versa.Full description below. Please review and message me with considerations. If any requirements are unable to be met, please let me know before we make a deal.SummaryThe goal of this project is to develop an Android application that can send calls through SIP and forward them to the GSM network AND receive calls from GSM and forward to SIP.The application should then forward the audio and convert from VoIP to GSM and vice versGeneralDeliveriesThe application working in APK formatFull source codeSimple manual for compiling and generating the application from sourceFeatures- Route call from SIP to GSM- Route call from GSM to SIP (preconfigured SIP client)- Convert audio from/to SIP and GSM networksApplication Configurations- Enable or disable the app- Enable to receive calls only on wifi or all networks- Enable to route calls from GSM to SIP (SIP address is configured through an API)- The number to send the call should be configured through an API that is supplied with the APP- Enable to route calls from SIP to GSM- Must run on background- Must be very lightweight to run on small memory devices- Configure SIP Accounts.Sip Requirements- Register on Sip Proxy/Gateway- Receive call authenticated by IP, user/pass or no authentication.- Make calls with or without authentication- Forward DTMF digits using RFC2833 or inband- Use codec G711 and GSM- Be able to use codec G729- Receive through GSM one 1 simultaneous call and rout it to a predefined SIP client- Be able to store a CSV with all calls made
title: SIP(voip)-GSM gateway

desc: We are looking for an expert team that is willing to solve all our problems with website and blockchain implementation software engeneers and cloud Infrasturcture Experts. Virtualisation.The goal is a whole new innovative coin, and many websites connected to each other, only teams that have mastered the process of an ICO from scratch to release and marketing are suitable.You need to provide us experience with other similar projects, we will check your CV in detail.As a startup with execllent connections to german high end automobile manufactures no failare is accecpted, on time deliver is important, team oriented working, a blockchain that supports the IOT is a must. Only value adding process (new software perhaps)Daily updates on the projectlater projects- we start with a simple online wallet servicev as a test of your skillsWhat kind of software you use is up to you, but it has to be explained each pro / cons of the software that you prefer.  Website needs to be keept simple and user-friendlyFrom Java / PHP / Python / Solidity / Html / ajax / erlang etc all needs to be explained , why you want to use this language.Pros and cons on ethereum blockchain ICOs or whole new Blockchain with new coinsThe websites should be done in a fast and simple easy to use way - Faucet website to generate imcome and traffic for testing further skills.The process needs to be explained in detail that from the dumberst to the most intelligent person understand what you are doing.Github is a must, copy pasting is no problemAdvanced skills in CryptoCoins / ICOs / Blockchain technology is great.We are all humans and we want people that know this and want to minimize failure and keep learning for themselves. Self development and 100% commitment to this project !The budget is limited as long as the first projects are onlineIf we are 100% satisfied with your work your budget will increas with the difficulty of the project.All access data is keept by our Company when the project is finished.This projets need to be incognito, no speaking or telling anything about the project is allowed and could lead to problems with lawyers.Only the best teams are suitable for this, think about the possibilities later to work with premium Automobile producer in Germany, you wont get this chance twice.Best wishes and good luck to be part of our team

desc: I need an Android app.  I would like it designed and built.  I am an Jamaican entrepreneur. I want to popularize and found my own mobile wallet company in my country. Simplicty is key. Making the app easy to use and easy to set up is essential . I have no understanding of programming as yet. Looking for good developer who i can work with after the creation of the app to make changes,updates and when I am ready make an easy transition to a teap of local developers. I need to the sole proprietor owner of the app. the app should be able to1. Send/Receive money from your peers2. Transfer money to friends3. Card free payment to merchants4. Scan & Pay – Scan & use the QR code to pay at your local storesA merchant app would be good, but having a choice to be a merchant while setting up the app would be. Easy simple integration into businesses such as taxis,stores, utility payments and so on would be necessary in future updates but i want to focus on the base app.
title: Cashlink app
